title.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, Feb. 12, 1930. Establishment of a New School.

div.bibl: The Greek Press, Feb. 12, 1930. ESTABLISHMENT OF A NEW SCHOOL.

body.p: A new school is being established on the South Side. The well-known Greek teacher, Mrs. Electra Zalouchos has furnished a schoolroom at 7909 South Park Avenue. It is to be called Likion o Socrates.
In order to make known to the public the scope and purpose of the school, an open meeting, to which all parents are invited, will be held Friday, Feb. 21, at 8 o'clock at the school.
